name: Dr. Bear Does X-rays
description:
Help Dr. Bear find all the broken bones.

Controls: Click on broken bones to slap a band-aid on them. Avoid the good bones.

This was made for the No Subject Matter Expert, NO Problem! game jam.

Suggestion: Don't play this game in Fullscreen

Music Used: Lonely Day by Telecasted

Background image from: https://dicomsolutions.com/
